channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：泰国对新加坡独家承办歌手泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）世界巡回演唱会东南亚唯一一站的协议表示不满。但 @mak_robyn 说，依靠这位明星来实现经济复苏似乎有些牵强。
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: Thailand has decried Singapore’s exclusive deal to host singer Taylor Swift’s only Southeast Asian stop on her world tour. But banking on the star for an economic recovery seems a stretch, says @mak_robyn pic.twitter.com/BPdtAP6RVG

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 英国 Quilter 公司警告称，在监管审查中可能会产生 "补救成本
item.description:
UK's Quilter warns of potential 'remedial costs' amid regulatory scrutiny https://t.co/qqVZWL6474 pic.twitter.com/Dt2NxkgrnE

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 一份关于跨国公司活动对环境影响的报告称，尼日利亚需要确保壳牌公司在撤离尼日尔三角洲之前安全地拆除其旧的基础设施，或付费将其从尼日尔三角洲移走。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Nigeria needs to ensure that Shell safely dismantles its old infrastructure or pays to remove them from the Niger delta before its exit, says a report on the environmental impact of the activities of multinational companies. More here: https://t.co/XmCExCy81A

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 法律与通用保险公司营业利润同比持平
item.description:
Insurer Legal & General posts flat operating profit year-on-year https://t.co/pP45aMSuab pic.twitter.com/L0lk5AlQ4M

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 中国年轻饮酒者对威士忌和白兰地的需求日益增长，全球饮料巨头都在努力开发这一市场，但它们在与中国主要白酒生产商的竞争中面临挑战。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Global drinks giants seeking to tap into younger Chinese drinkers' growing appetite for whiskies and cognacs face a challenge as they take on the producers of China's dominant liquor baijiu. More here: https://t.co/9Z9VczHv1R

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 随着从股票、加密货币到住房的资产价值不断攀升，通货膨胀率仍被认为过高，美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）将向美国国会议员介绍经济的最新情况，以及在政治气氛浓厚的大选年降息的前景。
item.description:
With asset values from stocks to crypto to homes piling higher and inflation still considered too high, Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell will update US lawmakers on the economy and prospects for interest rate cuts in a politically charged election year https://t.co/5QQTAncTvC

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 全球贸易不温不火，DHL 集团 2024 年预测与市场预期相差甚远
item.description:
DHL Group's 2024 forecast falls short of market view on tepid global trade https://t.co/DSZyhcZQus pic.twitter.com/VF4RsEZ28p

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 观看：塔吉特（Target）发布假日季度财报，销售额降幅小于预期，盈利增加，股价上涨 12%。
item.description:
WATCH: Target said that it would open more than 300 predominantly full-size stores over the next decade after it reported higher holiday-quarter earnings on a smaller-than-expected sales decline, sending its shares up 12% https://t.co/fDUVVrjPMU pic.twitter.com/Xd5nEofouN

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 新加坡星展银行首席执行官古普塔 2023 年薪酬总额下降 27% 至 830 万美元

Singaporean bank DBS CEO Gupta's total pay dropped 27% to $8.3 mln in 2023 https://t.co/Xoy4VSB5LZ pic.twitter.com/SsT9qpgiGn

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 为吸引更多银行而进行的欧洲银行同业拆借利率改革于五月启动
item.description:
Euribor overhaul to attract more banks starts in May https://t.co/n5sdYeuJQC pic.twitter.com/pgxgdajLyw

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 根据伍德麦肯兹和太阳能产业协会发布的一份报告，美国太阳能产业在去年占电网新增发电量的 50% 以上，预计将在 2024 年继续保持增长势头。
item.description:
The US solar industry is expected to continue its momentum in 2024 after accounting for over 50% of new electricity capacity additions to the grid last year, according to a report published by Wood Mackenzie and the Solar Energy Industries Association https://t.co/FzIL3fDQMX

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 印度中央银行要求发卡机构让用户选择网络
item.description:
India cenbank asks card issuers to give users choice of selecting network https://t.co/mBoi87VeHu pic.twitter.com/Y3uD1url1s

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 新加坡星展银行可持续融资增长 37%，2023 年达到 521 亿美元
item.description:
Singaporean bank DBS grows sustainable financing by 37% to $52.1 bln in 2023 https://t.co/Q47Q9zpGHK pic.twitter.com/oNPViKHZox

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 一个由两党议员组成的美国立法小组提出立法，要求中国字节跳动公司在六个月内剥离流行短视频应用 TikTok，否则将面临美国的禁令，以解决对其中国所有权的国家安全担忧。更多内容请点击此处：
item.description:
A bipartisan group of US lawmakers introduced legislation to give China's ByteDance about six months to divest popular short video app TikTok or face a US ban, seeking to tackle national security concerns about its Chinese ownership. More here: https://t.co/v7jYjAbYp1

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 比亚迪和其他中国汽车制造商正纷纷将新型电动汽车带入澳大利亚，因为澳大利亚市场没有贸易壁垒，而且由于电动汽车补贴和税收优惠以及高昂的汽油价格，澳大利亚的电动汽车销量激增。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
BYD and other Chinese automakers are bringing new electric car models in droves to Australia, a market where they haven't faced trade barriers and sales have surged due to EV subsidies and tax benefits as well as high gasoline prices. More here: https://t.co/WoXuW4nD1d

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 文件显示，Al Rajhi 银行出售 10 亿美元的 5 年期可持续债券
item.description:
Al Rajhi Bank sells $1 bln in 5-year sustainable sukuk, document shows https://t.co/gTThdwGv9u pic.twitter.com/6koWoL66p3

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 观看：华尔街主要股指大幅下挫，苹果和芯片股严重拖累纳斯达克指数
item.description:
WATCH: Wall Street’s main indexes dropped sharply, with Apple and chip stocks weighing heavily on the Nasdaq https://t.co/eaeg4p5644 pic.twitter.com/N0gDLAQNgm

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.description:
BOJ seen revising down assessment on consumption and output, sources say https://t.co/YZDgKA7Jg1 pic.twitter.com/VgNdcrLp6C

From @Breakingviews: @AnitaRamaswamy talks about the upcoming IPO of social media platform Reddit pic.twitter.com/DwTBylLdLw

item.title: 澳大利亚澳洲航空公司（Qantas Airways）被罚款 162,375 澳元，原因是该公司非法解雇了一名在 COVID 大流行早期告诉员工不要清洁从中国飞来的飞机的员工，这给该公司的声誉带来了更大的挑战。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Australia's Qantas Airways has been fined $162,375 for illegally sacking an employee who told staff not to clean aircraft arriving from China early in the COVID pandemic, adding to the airline's reputational challenges. More here: https://t.co/JnEA5MIyMG

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 本周，Tether 的发行量达到 1000 亿美元，这一全球最大稳定币的迅速崛起凸显了人们对更广泛金融市场潜在风险的担忧。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
As Tether toasts $100 billion in circulation this week, the rapid rise of the world's biggest stablecoin has highlighted concerns about potential risks to wider financial markets. More here: https://t.co/8lUThFaUjb

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 观看：在本周一系列经济数据和美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔发表讲话之前，苹果等大型成长型公司和芯片行业的疲软对纳斯达克指数的影响最大。
item.description:
WATCH: Wall Street's three major indexes all retreated more than 1%, with weakness in megacap growth companies such as Apple and the chip sector weighing most on the Nasdaq ahead of this week's crop of economic data and remarks from Fed Chair Jerome Powell https://t.co/eaeg4p5644 pic.twitter.com/fWWUruQpQo

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：首席执行官史蒂夫-赫夫曼（Steve Huffman）在社交媒体平台 Reddit 即将进行的首次公开募股中为 Reddit 用户预留了股票。@AnitaRamaswamy 说："但有些人在著名的'华尔街赌注'论坛上威胁要做空该股票，这表明他的计划可能会适得其反。
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: CEO Steve Huffman is setting aside shares for Reddit users in the social media platform’s upcoming IPO. But some have taken to its famous 'Wall Street Bets' forum to threaten to short the stock, suggesting his plan might backfire, says @AnitaRamaswamy pic.twitter.com/HkIK7YcCOz

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024
